text: niccayamaka, nam israyilin cantatikalukku (vakkalitta) mika vacatiyana itattait tantu, nalla unavukalaiyum avarkalukku alittu vantom. Akave, unmaiyana nanam (ennum ivvetam) avarkalitam varum varai itarkavarkal marupatavillai; (vantatan pinnare itai nirakarittu maru ceykinranar.) Etil avarkal maru ceykinranaro ataip parri avarkalukku marumai nalil niccayamaka (atutan unmai enru) umatu iraivan tirppalippan
